name: Maimai DX Splash
summary:
maimai Deluxe Splash is the second release of Sega's arcade rhythm game, maimai DX.

General Information / Changes:
Area mechanics revamped
- Task Track and Perfect Challenge added

Regular and infinite Areas in maimai でらっくす (except BLACK ROSEちほー) are no longer available, and songs previously unlockable in those Areas are unlocked by default.
- New users in Splash would obtain the 5 Tour Members in はじまりのちほー.

Changed the Areas in which some Tour Members are good at:
-「はじまりのちほー」 → 「はじまりのちほー2、しゅわしゅわちほー」
-「青春ちほー」 → 「みかんヶ岡ちほー 朝焼け通り、みかんヶ岡ちほー 月夜通り」
-「メトロポリスちほー」 → 「メトロポリスちほー2 イーシュ襲来、メトロポリスちほー2 黒姫の逆襲」
-「ドラゴンちほー」 → None
-「天界ちほー」 → 「天界ちほー2」
-「はじまりのちほー2」 → 「はじまりのちほー2、しゅわしゅわちほー」
-「東方Projectちほー」 → 「東方Projectちほー、東方Project×アトレ秋葉原ちほー」
-「東方Project×アトレ秋葉原ちほー」 → 「東方Projectちほー、東方Project×アトレ秋葉原ちほー」

In the Area selection screen, you can now skip to collab Areas or original Areas using buttons 7 and 2, respectively.

ボスオトモダチ (boss friend) appearing in オトモダチ対戦 (Friend Matching) changes again
- The boss friend of the grade 拾皆伝 possesses the song BATTLE NO.1, which can be obtained by defeating the boss friend. The song is a "conduction song" (伝導楽曲) that can be "conducted" to other players by playing it with them in multiplayer mode.
-- This is the first time the conduction mechanic is introduced since DX; it was called "shared song" (シェア楽曲) before DX versions.
- Players with grades of 二段 or higher in maimai でらっくす PLUS would be reset to 初段.
- オトモダチ対戦 can't be played on the first credit of maimai でらっくす Splash.

In regular song folders, a bubble appears above the jacket of songs chosen for Friend Matching, touching which would bring the player to the Friend Matching folder. Touching it again would return to regular song folders.

Frame Collections return.

New BREAK/SLIDE sounds "らいむっくま＆れもんっくま" (Lime-kuma & Lemon-kuma) added

Judgment line design "Splash" added

"Damage sound volume" settings item added

前前前世 revived; first revived song in SEGA music game history
- Score records for revived songs will not be retained, and revived songs will not be a part of the requirement in 極・将・神・舞舞・覇者 name plates.

Unlike with pre-DX maimai, the BGM is just a rearrangement of maimai でらっくす's BGM.

On September 15th, 2020, a tweet that announced the then-upcoming release of maimai ALL PERFECT COLLECTION mentioned that some songs in the album would get Standard Re:MASTER charts to celebrate the release of the album. These are the first Standard charts added since maimai でらっくす. They were added in three waves, the first beginning on October 23rd, 2020.

On September 25th, version 1.11 was released, which expanded the timing adjustment feature.
- The timing adjust feature that existed before DX1.10 was renamed "timing adjust A". The feature itself isn't changed; it changes the position that the BGM and charts start playing at, and changes the timing that the notes reach the judgment line.
- "Timing adjust B" is added. It adjusts the timing by changing the judgment position relative to the judgment line.

The icon for "FULL SYNC DX" is changed from "FDX" to "FSD".
